text: Today on the West Coast, it's a bit of a struggle with 2 ft @9s W and fresh 8 mph ENE winds making it blown out. Tomorrow sees a slight improvement with 2 ft @9s NW; some sheltered spots like Ardnave Bay and Saligo Bay could be workable despite the 17 mph E winds. The day after, conditions drop back to 2 ft @12s WNW with light 7 mph NNE winds, but still not producing much. Best: tomorrow.
